title: Cryptomining
extract: Cryptocurrency mining, or cryptomining, is a process in which transactions for various forms of cryptocurrency are verified and added to the blockchain digital ledger. ... In order to be competitive with other cryptominers, though, a cryptocurrency miner needs a computer with specialized hardware.
extract_html: Cryptocurrency mining, or cryptomining, is a process in which transactions for various forms of cryptocurrency are verified and added to the blockchain digital ledger. ... In order to be competitive with other cryptominers, though, a cryptocurrency miner needs a computer with specialized hardware.
